pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, March 7, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, March 7, 2016:

Toronto

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Giant Panda Cubs Celebration and Name Reveal at the Toronto Zoo and will deliver brief remarks.

Toronto Zoo
Main entrance
2000 Meadowvale Road
Toronto, ON

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Photo opportunity
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:00 a.m.

Media appearance

12:30 p.m. ET– to be streamed live on Huffington Post Canada

The Prime Minister will participate in Huffington Post Canada’s Town Hall on Foreign Policy.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
